text: "Loving You" is a 1957 song by Elvis Presley and is the title track to soundtrack Loving You. It was used in the 1957 movie Loving You. It went to number 24 in the United Kingdom and number 20 in the United States. It has been covered by numerous artists including The Dave Clark Five in 1971. title: Loving You (Elvis Presley song)
